languages.text: "Н-нижайше прошу простить этой правительнице глупость слов ее, ибо Гиблые Земли действительно раскинулись от края до края горизонта... Однако брат этой правительницы не был точен в своем предсказании..."

traits.locale_text: "Н-нижайше прошу простить этой правительнице глупость слов ее, ибо Гиблые Земли действительно раскинулись от края до края горизонта... Однако брат этой правительницы не был точен в своем предсказании..."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_VillageOverlord

languages.text: "I-I humbly beg your forgiveness for the foolishness of this ruler's words, for the Deadlands do indeed spread as far as the eye can see... However, this ruler's brother was not precise in his predictions..."
languages.original_text: "Н-нижайше прошу простить этой правительнице глупость слов ее, ибо Гиблые Земли действительно раскинулись от края до края горизонта... Однако брат этой правительницы не был точен в своем предсказании..."

languages.text: «Le-le ruego perdón por la estupidez de las palabras de esta jefa, pues las Tierras Muertas se extienden hasta donde alcanza la vista... pero el hermano de esta jefa no ha sido más concreto en sus predicciones...».
languages.original_text: "I-I humbly beg your forgiveness for the foolishness of this ruler's words, for the Deadlands do indeed spread as far as the eye can see... However, this ruler's brother was not precise in his predictions..."

traits.locale_text: «Le-le ruego perdón por la estupidez de sus palabras, pues las Tierras Muertas se extienden hasta donde alcanza la vista... pero el hermano de esta jefa no ha sido más concreto en sus predicciones...».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_VillageOverlord

languages.text: “我……我卑微地请求您原谅此酋长愚蠢的言辞，因为死亡之地确实一望无际……不过，此酋长的弟弟预言也并不是很准确……”
languages.original_text: "I-I humbly beg your forgiveness for the foolishness of this ruler's words, for the Deadlands do indeed spread as far as the eye can see... However, this ruler's brother was not precise in his predictions..."

traits.locale_text: “我……我卑微地请求您原谅我愚蠢的言辞，因为死亡之地确实一望无际……不过，此酋长的弟弟预言也并不是很准确……”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_VillageOverlord

languages.text: « C... Cette dirigeante vous demande pardon pour la stupidité de ses paroles, car il est vrai que les Terres mortes s'étendent à perte de vue. Cependant, les prédictions de Parle-aux-Dieux manquaient cruellement de précision... »
languages.original_text: "I-I humbly beg your forgiveness for the foolishness of this ruler's words, for the Deadlands do indeed spread as far as the eye can see... However, this ruler's brother was not precise in his predictions..."

traits.locale_text: « C... Cette dirigeante vous demande pardon pour la stupidité de ses paroles, car il est vrai que les Terres mortes s'étendent à perte de vue. Cependant, les prédictions de Parle-aux-Dieux manquaient cruellement de précision... »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_VillageOverlord

languages.text: 「ど、どうか愚かな支配者の言葉にお許しを。死の大地は確かに見渡す限り広がっている…しかし、この支配者の兄弟の予測は正確ではなかった…」
languages.original_text: "I-I humbly beg your forgiveness for the foolishness of this ruler's words, for the Deadlands do indeed spread as far as the eye can see... However, this ruler's brother was not precise in his predictions..."

traits.locale_text: 「ど、どうか愚かな支配者の言葉にお許しを。死の大地は確かに見渡す限り広がっている…しかし、この支配者の兄弟の予測は正確ではなかった…」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_VillageOverlord

languages.text: "I-Ich bitte demütigst um Vergebung für die törichten Worte dieser Herrscherin, denn die Todlande breiten sich in der Tat so weit aus, wie das Auge sehen kann ... Doch der Bruder dieser Herrscherin war in seinen Vorhersagen nicht sonderlich präzise gewesen ..."
languages.original_text: "I-I humbly beg your forgiveness for the foolishness of this ruler's words, for the Deadlands do indeed spread as far as the eye can see... However, this ruler's brother was not precise in his predictions..."

traits.locale_text: "I-Ich bitte demütigst um Vergebung für ihre törichten Worte, denn die Todlande breiten sich in der Tat so weit aus, wie das Auge sehen kann ... Doch der Bruder dieser Herrscherin war in seinen Vorhersagen nicht sonderlich präzise gewesen ..."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_VillageOverlord

languages.text: "Bu hükümdarın sözlerindeki ahmaklık için tüm tevazumla affına sığınıyorum. Çünkü Ölü Diyarlar, hakikaten de göz alabildiğine uzanır... Ancak bu hükümdarın kardeşi, kehanetlerinde kesin konuşmamıştı..."
languages.original_text: "I-I humbly beg your forgiveness for the foolishness of this ruler's words, for the Deadlands do indeed spread as far as the eye can see... However, this ruler's brother was not precise in his predictions..."
